lead_paragraph: Going by division standings, the game between the Buccaneers and the Redskins today in Tampa, Fla., is a matchup of the first-place team in the National Football Conference South and a team tied for last place in the N.F.C East. But Tampa Bay (6-4) and Washington (5-5) are separated by only one game in the conference standings, and winning this game is vital to each team’s playoff hopes.
